thread.section_title: SJF Material Handling Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SJF Material Handling Inc. | sjf.com
thread.title: Brent Lindstrom
thread.title_full: SJF Material Handling Inc. reviewed by Brent Lindstrom

author: Brent Lindstrom
title: Brent Lindstrom
text:
We recently made several small purchases to complete a addition we did to our parts storage area. Jason D. was very helpful in getting us what we needed and at a fair price. I think Jason deserves a HEALTHY raise!!!!
I am getting less patient in my old age and response time never seems to be fast enough for me, is the only reason for the 4 star rather than 5 star rating.
I will continue to do business with SJF and have referred you to others.
